meanings.definition: A type of garment worn around the waist, typically consisting of a pleated, knee-length skirt.
meanings.sent1: She twirled in her philabegs, feeling the fabric swish around her legs.
meanings.sent2: The Scottish dancer wore traditional philabegs during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The philabegs seemed to have a mind of their own, dancing along with her.
meanings.sent4: Her philabegs billowed in the wind like a colorful flag fluttering in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The bright tartan pattern of the philabegs caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To wear or put on philabegs.
meanings.sent1: He carefully philabegs before the Highland festival.
meanings.sent2: She philabegs her traditional attire with pride.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to philabegs the oversized garment.
meanings.sent4: She philabegs her heritage like a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: Before the dance, they all excitedly philabegs their colorful skirts.
